overview: I knew Cherie was crazy when I started dating her, but this is crazy on a whole new level. She can sense something's up. She used to joke about me having "a thing" for my stepmom, but now she sees the truth. I didn't think it was so wrong to keep my relationships separate, at least for a couple of days until I could wrap my head around what in the hell I'm doing.
title: Let Them Talk
